root: ^Situation looks grim so I'll be quick, this is no ordinary lantern. You're going to use its light to drive out the evil from the monster.
^Here, you have a soul inventory and a grid to place soul blocks in.
^When you hover over my block, you can see what I can do in the black box.
^You're running low on health, I can help with that!
^Drag my soul block into the grid to activate it. To use me, you'll have to end your turn by clicking the lantern.
